Game Information:  
In the yard in 2054. Magic returned to the world, prompting
powerful creatures of myth and legend.Mir where technology
merge with the body and mind. Elves, trolls, orcs and dwarves
walk among us, while ruthless corporation drains bloody world.

You 'Running in the Shadows' - a mercenary, who lives on the
outskirts of the survivors, in the shadow of the massive corporate
arcology. You should look for a job at any price to survive.

In Seattle Metroplex overgrown you go in search of the mysterious
killer, whose tracks lead you to places ranging from dark slums and
ending megakorpusami. You will need to carefully deystovat,
with the support of other runners. Need to master the powerful
technology and magic to escape the shadow of the Seattle sound.
